Topic.Title: How do you make a game playable on mobile?

Posts.EditableText: is it possible if so how do i make it playable on mobile devices
Posts.HTML: is it possible if so how do i make it playable on mobile devices

Posts.EditableText: The web version works on mobile browsers, but you might have to disable the scroll-to-end function which is badly broken.
Posts.HTML: The web version works on mobile browsers, but you might have to disable the scroll-to-end function which is badly broken.
